actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to improve the program of payments for Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Amendments - Title I: Amendments Relating to Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance - Eliminates, under the Social Security Act, retroactive payment benefits in specified circumstances. Provides that, with enumerated exceptions, no individual shall be entitled to benefits for any month prior to the month in which he files an application if the effect of such payment would be to reduce the monthly benefits to which the individual would otherwise be entitled.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to improve the program of payments for Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance.
